snippet.title: Shining The Holy Ark Trailer 1997
snippet.description:
Shining The Holy Ark Trailer 1997

Official Content From Sega Of America

From the world of 'Shining in the Darkness' comes an incredible new adventure! Travel through dungeons, castles, and forests, experiencing seamlessly integrated cinemas and real-time 3D action!
Platforms: Sega Saturn

Sega Saturn
, RPG,  video game, trailer, spot, preview, clip, play, Shining The Holy Ark
